refnamediv.refpurpose: Short description on the first line following the function header.

refsynopsisdiv.title: Syntax
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: [dsdata, ds_datetime, ds_datetime_serial] = downsample_v2(data, datetime, separators, frequency, method)

listitem.para: n x m matrix of values, downsampled data
n x 6 matrix of values, downsampled datetime. columns are arranged as [year, month, day, hour, minute, second]
n x 1 column vector of values, downsampled datetime in serial datetime format.
N x m matrix of values, data to be downsamples
N x 1 vector of strings, date and time data
row vector of strings, all separators required for splitting datetime
string value, downsampling frequency. Options are minutely, hourly, daily, monthly, annually. OR supply frequency as a vector of values in the format [Years Months Days Hours Minutes Seconds].
string variable, mean, median or stdev
